title: Wonderful 1050 sqft, 2 bed, 1 bath floorplan at Stonetree Apartments
posting_body: ['Welcome to Stonetree Apartments!', '2414 Stone Rd East Point, GA 30344', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 1 BA - 1050 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1242 - $1501 |', 'Lease Length:', 'Variable', 'show contact info', 'Residents of Stonetree Apartments enjoy giant savings on East Point apartment rentals; and, with FREE Wi-Fi in the complimentary business center, a heart healthy gym and access to local markets they save even more!', 'Stonetree is convenient to Atlanta in less than 10 minutes with MARTA right outside the community and quick accessibility to I-20, I-75 and the perimeter, I-285!', 'Our community features:', '− 24 Hour Availability', '− Business Center/Clubhouse', "− Children's Playground Area", '− Convenient Online Rental Payments', '− Located in The Heart of East Point', '− Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '− Package Service', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Resident Referral Program', '− Sparkling Swimming Pool', '− City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '− Clothes Care Facility', '− Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '− Convenient to DeKalb Medical and Emory Hospitals/Medical Centers', '− Less than 15 Minutes from Downtown Atlanta', '− Minutes to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport', '− Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '− On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '− Stone Mountain Park Close', 'By', '− Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'Our unit features:', '− Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '− Carpeted Floor', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Central Air Conditioning and Efficient Gas Heat', '− Dishwasher', '− Fully-Equipped Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '− Oven', '− Range', '− Tub/Shower', '− Vinyl Flooring', '− Designer Mini Blinds', '− Fireplace in Select 2 Bedroom Units Only', '− Formal Dining Room', '− Frost-Free Refrigerator', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Individual Laundry Rooms with Washer/Dryer Connections', '− Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '− Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '− Trash Compactor', '− Wet Bar', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C178A814C1D44B7']
